content:
# I have successfully gathered 10 Copper Ore. The recipe for the Assembling Machine 1 indicates that I need 9 Iron Plates, 5 Iron Gear Wheels, and 3 Electronic Circuits to craft it.

# Currently, I have 3 Iron Gear Wheels and 6 Iron Plates, which means I need to gather more Iron Plates and Iron Gear Wheels.

# First, let's focus on smelting the Copper Ore into Copper Plates, which will allow me to craft the required Copper Cables for the Electronic Circuits.

# I will place another Stone Furnace to smelt the Copper Ore, as I currently have only one furnace. 

# First, I need to check for a buildable position for the new Stone Furnace.

copper_furnace_position = nearest_buildable(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Locate the nearest buildable position for the Stone Furnace
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=copper_furnace_position)  # Place the new Stone Furnace for Copper Ore
print(f"Placed Copper Furnace at: {copper_furnace_position}")  # Print the position of the placed entity

# Now, I will insert some coal and Copper Ore into the new Stone Furnace to start smelting.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, copper_furnace_position, quantity=5)  # Insert coal into the new Stone Furnace
insert_item(Prototype.CopperOre, copper_furnace_position, quantity=10)  # Insert Copper Ore into the new Stone Furnace
print(f"Inventory after inserting copper ore and coal: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after adding resources to the furnace
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check entities on the map again
